overview: In Estonia a political prisoner leaves the jail, only to discover that his best friend had stolen his girl. In Latvia a Russian soldier has a Latvian girlfriend. Her Latvian friends accept her boyfriend. But other Russian soldiers use coarse violence against them.  In Lithuania an old priest had spent 15 years in Siberia and may still be secretly watched by the police.
tagline: Three stories from each Baltic country about tragic love, but always with a political background.
title: The Baltic Love
